sentences.en: Double-check that the ladder is secure.
sentences.cn: 再检查一下那梯子是否牢固。

sentences.en: Get up the ladder, and I'll pass the paint up.
sentences.cn: 把梯子竖起来, 我要把油漆递上去.

sentences.en: He climbed the ladder in defiance of the warning.
sentences.cn: 他无视警告爬上了那架梯子.

sentences.en: He hurt himself falling off a ladder.
sentences.cn: 他从梯子上摔下来受了伤。

sentences.en: He put his foot on the bottom rung to keep the ladder steady.
sentences.cn: 他用脚踩住最底下的横档稳住梯子。

sentences.en: He slipped off the ladder and fell to the ground.
sentences.cn: 他从梯子上滑下来摔在地上.

sentences.en: He was halfway up the ladder.
Her whole body began to buckle, unbalancing the ladder.
sentences.cn: 她整个身体开始弯曲，搞得梯子倾侧起来。

sentences.en: Hold the ladder tightly and move up a rung at a time.
sentences.cn: 抓紧梯子一级一级地往上爬.

sentences.en: Millson saw the workman, Terry, descending the ladder.
sentences.cn: 米尔森看见工人特里正从梯子上下来。

sentences.en: The only ladder to assure success is to work hard.
sentences.cn: 确保成功的惟一途径是刻苦努力.

sentences.en: This ladder doesn't seem very stable.
Two men were on the bridge-deck, steadying a ladder.
sentences.cn: 两名男子在船桥甲板上扶着一架梯子不让它摇晃。

sentences.en: Uncle George quickly descended the ladder and nimbly stepped aboard.
sentences.cn: 乔治叔叔迅速爬下梯子，敏捷地上了船。

sentences.en: We climbed rather perilously down a rope-ladder to the boat below.
sentences.cn: 我们冒着相当大的危险沿着绳梯爬到了下面的船上。

phrases.tran_cn: 企业晋升制度；公司的官阶；公司晋升制度

trans.tran_cn: 梯子，阶梯，梯状物，途径，（紧身裤袜或长筒袜的）滑丝
trans.tran_en: a piece of equipment used for climbing up to or down from high places. A ladder has two bars that are connected by rungs(= short bars that you use as steps ) .

trans.tran_cn: 使（袜子）发生抽丝现象，像长筒袜一样抽丝
